instruction: What metric was chosen to identify soil types in the Upper Indus Plain of Pakistan Pothwar region and Doabs, and how far can this metric go?

instruction: Can the classification using spectral data, which achieved an overall accuracy of 86.61% for Random Forest and 84.41% for Logistic Model Tree, be considered superior to traditional methods for identifying soil types using remote sensing data in the Upper Indus Plain of Pakistan Pothwar region and Doabs?

In contrast, the digital soil mapping approach using remote sensing data offers rapidity, low cost, and spatial resolution advantages.
